entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
